title: A Rose in Winter
description: The world is changing.Winter is on its way as Freya waits anxiously for the return of her husband. Being the Lady of her village is both challenging and rewarding, but when a band of travelers appear asking for shelter, will she make the right choice based on her gut? Or will her village burn for its hospitality?Asgar is focused on his revenge and getting home to his enchanting wife, both fueling his sword. His men follow him no matter what or where, but when they become stranded, will their loyalty fall apart?Change is on the horizon for these Vikings. Are they strong enough to survive it and find the life among all of the death, or will they succumb to the cold?Vengeance filled war. Death. New life.What will find Asgar and Freya?
author: Theresa Marguerite Hewitt
